name: wp image slideshow
author: Gopi Ramasamy

sections.description:
Check official website for live demo http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2011/05/06/wordpress-plugin-wp-image-slideshow/

  • Live Demo
  • Plugin More Information
  • User Comments
  • About Author

This is advanced version of my drop in image slideshow gallery. In this gallery each image is dropped into view. Slideshow will pause on mouse over. This plugin have separate image management link in the admin dashboard. From that dashboard link admin can manage the gallery images and target links. In the old drop in image slideshow plugin the images retrieved directly from folder.

  • Free.
  • Easy to customize.
  • Support all browser.
  • Automatically pauses on mouse over.
  • Short code available for pages and posts.
  • Hyperlink option to each images.
  • Display image order option available also random order option available.

We have three option to install and configure this wp image slideshow plugin.

Translators

  • English (en_EN) – Gopi Ramasamy
  • Polish (pl_PL) – Abdul Sattar

http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2011/05/06/wordpress-plugin-wp-image-slideshow/
sections.installation:
Method 1

File upload using ftp

Method 2

Direct upload from website admin

Method 3

Upload from website admin with ZIP file

Configuration

We have 3 option to configure this plugin click here to see more info.
sections.faq:
Q1. How to arrange the width & height of the slideshow?

Q2. How to change the drop delay time?

Q3. Where to upload my image?

Q4. How to group the images for different gallery?

Q5. What is difference between “Drop in image slideshow gallery” and “Wp image slideshow”

Q6. How the slide show manages the order?

Q7. Is possible to load images in the random order?

More info : click to go
sections.changelog:
1.0

First version

2.0

Javascript validation included for admin image management form.

3.0

Javascript added as per W3C standard.
Tested up to 3.2.1

4.0

Tested up to 3.3

5.0

Tested up to 3.4

6.0

Fixed plug-in directory violations issue

7.0

JavaScript loaded by using the wp_enqueue_scripts hook (instead of the init hook), This will avoid the JavaScript, Jquery conflict.
Slight change in the short code, Please find the new short code.

8.0

New demo link, http://www.gopiplus.com

9.0

Tested up to 3.5

10.0

Tested up to 3.6
Added security feature that wordpress offers us.

10.1

  1. Tested up to 3.8
  2. Now this plugin supports localization (or internationalization). i.e. option to translate into other languages.
    Plugin *.po file (wp-image-slideshow.po) available in the languages folder. Translators Welcome.

10.2

  1. Tested up to 3.9
  2. Added small security feature.

10.3

  1. Tested up to 4.0

10.4

  1. Tested up to 4.1

10.5

  1. Tested up to 4.2.2

10.6

  1. Tested up to 4.3
  2. Image upload option is added in the plugin admin. With this option you can easily upload (or select from media) your images into this plugin.

10.7

  1. Tested up to 4.3.1
  2. Text Domain slug has been added for Language Packs.

10.8

  1. Tested up to 4.4

10.9

  1. Tested up to 4.5
  2. Sanitization added for all input value.

11.0

  1. Tested up to 4.6

11.1

  1. Tested up to 4.7

11.2

  1. Tested up to 4.8

11.3

  1. Tested up to 4.9

11.4

  1. Tested up to 5.2
  2. Uninstall option added. All plugin reference and plugin table will be cleared during uninstallation.
  3. Converted admin JS alert message into WP class file.

11.5

  1. Tested up to 5.3

11.7

  1. Tested up to 5.5

11.8

  1. Tested up to 5.7

11.9

  1. Tested up to 5.8
  2. Use plugin short code in the widget.

12.0

  1. Tested up to 5.9

12.1

  1. Tested up to 6.4

short_description: This wp image slideshow plugin is your regular image slideshow plugin, except each image is dropped into view.
